title: "Nuix to pay $34m for US-based natural language processing vendor Topos Labs"
excerpt: "Australian data management vendor Nuix is set to acquire US-based natural language processing (NLP) software vendor Topos Labs for up to US$25 million (approx. AU$34 million). The terms of the acquisition will see an initial cost of US$5 million with up to US$18."
